thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Sylvia Wilkerson

author: Sylvia Wilkerson
title: Sylvia Wilkerson
text: The sales associate named Kris Sempolkrungmade my experience with Drive Time most pleasant. The was at tentative, patient, and caring with me and my son He worked hard to ensure that I was happy and satisfied with the vehicle I purchased. He also did follow up calls with me to make sure that I am happy with the vehicle or have any concerns. Again Krit made my experience a pleasant one.
